name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D Birthday Live】I'll Be Your Angle Or Yuor Devil #HELLoHALO [CLxtrooDlP8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Ouro Kronii (Angel version) performs the song 'Connect' on a 3D stage with celestial architecture.
MC segment featuring Ouro Kronii (Angel), Ouro Kronii (Devil), and a Giant Chibi Ouro Kronii appearing in the sky.

subtitles.original: ...でいつも待っててくれる
subtitles.english: ...where you're always waiting for me.

subtitles.original: だから怖くない
subtitles.english: So I'm not afraid.

subtitles.original: もう何があっても
subtitles.english: No matter what happens now,

subtitles.original: 挫けない
subtitles.english: I won't give up.

subtitles.original: 振り返れば仲間がいて
subtitles.english: When I look back, my friends are there.

subtitles.original: 気がつけば優しく包まれてた
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I was gently surrounded.

subtitles.original: 何もかもが歪んだ世界で
subtitles.english: In a world where everything was distorted,

subtitles.original: 唯一信じられるここが救いだった
subtitles.english: This place, the only thing I could believe in, was my salvation.

subtitles.original: 喜びも悲しみも
subtitles.english: Both joy and sadness,

subtitles.original: 分け合えば強まる想い
subtitles.english: If we share them, our feelings grow stronger.

subtitles.original: この声が届くのなら
subtitles.english: If this voice reaches you,

subtitles.original: きっと奇跡は起こせるだろう
subtitles.english: I'm sure we can make a miracle happen.

subtitles.original: 交わした約束忘れないよ
subtitles.english: I won't forget the promise we made.

subtitles.original: 目を閉じ確かめる
subtitles.english: I close my eyes and confirm it.

subtitles.original: 押し寄せた闇振り払って進むよ
subtitles.english: I'll push aside the encroaching darkness and move forward.

subtitles.original: いつかあした信じて祈って
subtitles.english: Believing in a tomorrow someday, and praying.

subtitles.original: 壊れた世界で彷徨って私は
subtitles.english: Wandering in a broken world, I...

subtitles.original: 引き寄せられるようにたどり着いた
subtitles.english: ...arrived as if drawn here.

subtitles.original: 目覚めた心は走り出した
subtitles.english: My awakened heart began to run,

subtitles.original: 未来を描くため
subtitles.english: to paint the future.

subtitles.original: 難しい道で立ち止まっても
subtitles.english: Even if I stop on a difficult path,

subtitles.original: 空はきれいな青でいつも待っててくれる
subtitles.english: the sky is a beautiful blue, always waiting for me.

subtitles.original: だから怖くない
subtitles.english: So I'm not afraid.

subtitles.original: もう何があっても挫けない
subtitles.english: No matter what happens now, I won't give up.

subtitles.original: ずっとあした待って
subtitles.english: Always waiting for tomorrow.

subtitles.original: Hey, what are you doing here again?
subtitles.english: Hey, what are you doing here again?

subtitles.original: Are you trying to upstage me here of all places?
subtitles.english: Are you trying to upstage me here of all places?

subtitles.original: Umm, I don't think it comes off...
subtitles.english: Umm, I don't think it comes off...

subtitles.original: Well, you know, I refuse to let that happen.
subtitles.english: Well, you know, I refuse to let that happen.

subtitles.original: After all, I'm Ouro Kronii!
subtitles.english: After all, I'm Ouro Kronii!

subtitles.original: Wh-wh-ar-are you seeing what I'm seeing right now?
subtitles.english: Wh-wh-ar-are you seeing what I'm seeing right now?

subtitles.original: Yeah... oh geez.
subtitles.english: Yeah... oh geez.

subtitles.original: You two down there. Yes, you.
subtitles.english: You two down there. Yes, you.

subtitles.original: Uh, hello? I'm right here. Uh, rude.
subtitles.english: Uh, hello? I'm right here. Uh, rude.

subtitles.original: One of you does not belong here.
subtitles.english: One of you does not belong here.

subtitles.original: Oh. Yeah, that's right.
subtitles.english: Oh. Yeah, that's right.

subtitles.original: Get out of here!
subtitles.english: Get out of here!

subtitles.original: Oh, yeah. Whatever you want to believe, I guess.
subtitles.english: Oh, yeah. Whatever you want to believe, I guess.

subtitles.original: Anyway, behold a stage more fitting for the likes of you.
subtitles.english: Anyway, behold a stage more fitting for the likes of you.

subtitles.original: Oh. I mean, of course.
subtitles.english: Oh. I mean, of course.

subtitles.original: Of course I'm the more angelic and kind-hearted one, of course.
subtitles.english: Of course I'm the more angelic and kind-hearted one, of course.

subtitles.original: Oh man, you are so based.
subtitles.english: Oh man, you are so based.
